content: +++http://apnews.myway.com/article/20090429/D97SD35O0.html At airports from Japan to South Korea to Greece and Turkey, thermal cameras were trained on airline passengers to see if any were feverish. And Lebanon discouraged traditional Arab peck-on-the-cheek greetings, even though no one has come down with the virus there. And now a complete list of what we are doing: Hope and Change
